Vouch Mobile in Illinois: Unlimited Plans on AT&T's Network

Get unlimited talk, text & data in the Prairie State for just $30/month. No credit check required.

Data from Illinois Census Data

Illinois combines big-city Chicago with small-town values across the Prairie State. Vouch Mobile delivers the connectivity Chicagoland commuters demand at a price that respects Midwestern frugality.

AT&T Network Coverage in Illinois

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Illinois residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Prairie State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Illinois, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Major Illinois Cities We Cover

Vouch Mobile provides excellent coverage in all major Illinois metropolitan areas:

Chicago

Full 5G coverage throughout Chicagoland, from the Loop to the suburbs

Aurora

Comprehensive coverage in the western suburbs along I-88

Naperville

Strong coverage in DuPage County's tech corridor

Springfield

Excellent coverage in the state capital

Rockford

Reliable service in Northern Illinois

Champaign-Urbana

Full coverage around U of I campus

Why Illinois Residents Choose Vouch Mobile

  • Illinois' average phone bill of $115/month hits hard in a state with high taxes—Vouch cuts that by 74%.
  • Whether you're riding the L, driving Lake Shore Drive, or working in the Loop, you need coverage that never drops.
  • No credit check means U of I students, new Chicago residents, and gig workers can sign up instantly.
  • AT&T's network covers Illinois from Chicago to Carbondale, with excellent coverage along the I-90/94 corridor.

The Illinois DCEO shows that Illinois has a high economic data, making affordable phone service even more valuable.

How to Get Started in Illinois

  1. Check Your Phone: Make sure your phone is unlocked and compatible. Learn how to check.
  2. Choose Your Plan: Select our $30/month unlimited plan.
  3. Order Your SIM: Free shipping to any Illinois address.
  4. Activate Online: Simple activation takes just minutes. See our switching guide.
  5. Start Saving: Enjoy unlimited service across Illinois.

Illinois Coverage FAQ

Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% population coverage across Illinois using AT&T's network. From Chicago to Springfield, Rockford to Champaign, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout the Prairie State.

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Illinois. AT&T provides extensive 5G coverage throughout Chicagoland and reliable LTE across downstate Illinois.

Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Illinois. The average Illinoisan pays $115/month for phone service, so you could save over $1,020 per year by switching to Vouch.

No credit check required. Whether you're a Northwestern student, a new Chicago resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly.

Switching is easy: check that your phone is unlocked, order a free Vouch SIM card shipped to your Illinois address, then activate online in minutes. You can keep your existing phone number—we'll handle the port.

Yes! 5G is available in Chicago, Aurora, Naperville, Rockford, Joliet, Peoria, and many other Illinois cities. Your 5G access is included free with your $30/month plan.

Yes. You'll have coverage throughout the CTA system, including underground stations, and along Metra commuter rail lines throughout Chicagoland.

Yes. AT&T's network covers communities throughout Central and Southern Illinois, including Springfield, Champaign-Urbana, Peoria, and Carbondale.
